global_options.description: Port to connect to on the remote host
Preserves modification times, access times, and modes from the original file

type.data: (cat ~/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null | cut -d' ' -f1 | cut -d',' -f1 | grep -v '^\['; grep -E '^Host ' ~/.ssh/config 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}' | grep -v '*') | sort -u
